sentences.en: His defense, which seems credible on the evidence so far, is that the bank masked its skullduggery so completely that no regulator anywhere in the world could get a handle on it.
sentences.cn: 他的辩词(根据目前证据似乎可信)是:银行把它的偷天换日的做法遮掩得天衣无逢,全世界任何地方的监管人员都无法掌握.

sentences.en: The democratic ideals of the US' founding fathers are something to be proud of, but there'snothing to be proud of in this brave new world of spying, secrecy and skullduggery.
sentences.cn: 美国开国元勋的民主理想是一件值得骄傲的事，但这个充满间谍、秘密和欺骗勇敢新世界却没有任何值得骄傲之处。

sentences.en: There must be political skullduggery afoot!
